name: Krampus (itch) (Miaro)
description:
Danger is upon Christmas...

Santa Claus has gone missing! Only you, an elf working for the Christmas Factory, is here to run the place and make sure the children will get their presents in time.

You are now in charge of the Factory and your goal is to assemble and wrap the toys in order to send them. But beware as you are not alone! An evil creature is roaming and its only purpose is to detroy the magic of Christmas and you with it...

YOU MUST NOT LET THE KRAMPUS SEE YOU!

In this first person horror game, you must remain silent and discreet if you want to avoid the Krampus' attention. Make best use of your environment by hiding in safe places or even distract the monster with your surroundings. You still have a mission to accomplish if you wish to save Christmas! Find and assemble the various toy parts scattered around the Factory and wrap them before time runs out...

Only you can save Christmas, we are all counting on you!
